ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْفَتْحُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'When will this victory come if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they say: "When will this decree come, if you speak the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: “If you are truthful, (tell us) when will the Judgement come?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They say, "If what you say is true, when will the final triumph come?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this decision take place, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They say: "When will this Fath be, if you are telling the truth"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When will this judgment take place, If you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They also say, 'When shall be this Victory, if you speak truly?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When cometh this victory (of yours) if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And they say, "When will this judgement come, if you are telling the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: When will this Decision arrive if ye are truthtellers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘When will this judgement be, if you are truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "When will this decision be, if ye are telling the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They say: "When will this Al-Fath (Decision) be (between us and you, i.e. the Day of Resurrection), if you are telling the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They also ask: 'When will this Opening come, if what you say is true'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When is this victory, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [32:28] And they say, to the believers: ‘When will this [decisive] Judgement, between us and yourselves, be, if you   are truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) i.e. Banu Khuzaymah and Banu Kinanah say: (When cometh this victory (of yours)) the conquest of Mecca (if ye are truthful) that it will be conquered? They asked this question to mock the believers.
